channel.title: DJ Theo's Soulful San Francisco House Sessions
channel.description: Welcome to DJ Theo's Weekly Soulful San Francisco House Sessions. Every Friday there will be a new 1 hour mix free to listen and download by everyone around the world! Much Love! EMAIL: djtheosf@hotmail.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: DJ Theo's Soulful San Francisco House Sessions
channel.itunes:author: DJ Theo
channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to DJ Theo's Weekly Soulful San Francisco House Sessions. Every Friday there will be a new 1 hour mix free to listen and download by everyone around the world! Much Love! EMAIL: djtheosf@hotmail.com

item.title: 06_01_2012 DJ Theo's Soulful San Francisco House Sessions
item.description: Hi Everyone! Yesterday would have been my Father's 60 Birthday if he was still alive. He passed away in 2010. I love him very much and miss hanging out with him and talking about the World. This month I am bringing you back the guest DJs! We have Gil (The Funky Black Man) http://zfbm.podomatic.com playing the 2nd hour after me. Then we have DJ Pops http://djpops.podomatic.com from South Africa finishing the 3rd hour for us. So you guys get almost 3 hours of music this podcast! Big Thank You to All the people who Donated on Pay Pal. Every Little Bit Helps! If you have been a listener for a while and would like to help contribute to this podcast click on the "Donate Pay Pal" Icon at the bottom right of this website and donate whatever you can afford! Much Love to Podomatic and ITUNES. Playlist Coming Soon! Make Love, Not War! Peace, Theo :)

item.title: 05_02_2012 DJ Theo's Soulful San Francisco House Sessions
item.description: Hi Everyone! Here is this month's Podcast mix Dedicated to Emily from Australia from her Husband Greg. Her Birthday is on May 2, 2012. HAPPY BIRTHDAY! I have included most of her favorite songs. Thank You Very Much for the podcast donation! I really appreciate your help to keep bringing this mix every month. Playlist coming soon! Make Love, Not War, Peace, Theo :)
item.dc:creator: DJ Theo
item.itunes:summary: Hi Everyone! Here is this month's Podcast mix Dedicated to Emily from Australia from her Husband Greg. Her Birthday is on May 2, 2012. HAPPY BIRTHDAY! item.title: 04_06_2012 DJ Theo's Soulful San Francisco House Sessions
item.description: Hi Everyone! We are back in Business after a 3 month "Breather." I wanted everyone to appreciate the podcast & not take it for granted. Due to increasing costs for "hosting" the bandwidth every month & supplying new music I will be bringing you a new mix once a month in the beginning. I would like to Thank ALL the people who donated on Paypal to help make this podcast possible. If you have been a listener for a while you can help also by clicking on the paypal "donation" button on the bottom right hand of the website. THANK YOU ALL VERY MUCH! Here is the Playlist: 1) "Never Enough" - Boris Dlugosch feat. Roisin Murphy (Fuzion Groove Orchestra Vocal Mix) 2) "Walking Through The Darkness" - The 1200 Warriors feat. Tekitha (Club Mix) 3) "Passin Thru" - Poussez vs. Demarkus Lewis feat. Hannah Khemoh (Sean McCabe Vocal Remix) 4) "The More I Get, The More I Want" - Davidson Ospina feat. David Walker (Main Mix) 5) "Move Your Body" - Marshall Jefferson feat. Curtis McClain (Maurice Joshua Remix) 6) "Turn Me Loose" - Real Love EP (Original Mix) 7) "Notice Me" - Matthias Heilbronn & Sandee (Soulflower Mix) 8) "Ton Regad Eclaire Ma Vi" - Moon Rocket (Original Mix) 9) "Jezebel" - Professor feat. Charactor & Oskido (Alix Alvarez Maftown Mix) 10) "Beautiful" - Jask feat. Jocie (Moon Rocket's Ristretto Mix) Make Love, Not War! Peace, DJ Theo :)

item.title: 01_06_2012 DJ Theo's Soulful San Francisco House Sessions
item.description: Hi Everyone! Happy New Year 2012! Hope you all had a Fun & Safe weekend. This week I am bringing you 10 of my favorite tracks from last year's podcasts. Much Love to All the Listeners around the World. 1) "That Thing About Deep" - Agev Munsen & Roland Clark (Munsen's Main Mix) 2) "Troubled Waters" - Sybil (Muthafunkaz Vocal) 3) "Feel Alive" - Jamie Lewis feat. Ana (Jamie Lewis Vibe Mix) 4) "Love is Psychodelic" - Bob Sinclair (Knee Deep Edit) 5) "Get Your Thing Together" - Soulmagic & Ebony Soul (Soulmagic Main Mix) 6) "What A Way" - DJN Project & Kenny Bobien (Original Mix) 7) "He Loves Me" - Nick Doe feat. Louise Golb (Main Vocal Mix) 8) "Take Your Time" - Random Soul feat. Kristen Pears (Random Soul Classic Mix) 9) "A Song of Love" - Blck Tulip (D-Reflection Remix 2011) 10) "How Deep Is Your Love" - Harley & Muscle feat. Joi Cardwell (Souldynamic Vocal Remix) Make Love, Not War! Peace, Theo

item.title: 12_30_2011 DJ Theo's Soulful San Francisco House Sessions
item.description: Hi Everyone! Happy New Year 2012! I hope you all had a fun & safe weekend. Now it's back to business. Here is the 2 hour New Years mix featuring myself for the first hour and DJ Ern http://djernie.podomatic.com . Playlist coming soon. Make Love, Not War! Peace, Theo :)

item.title: 12_23_2011 DJ Theo's Soulful San Francisco House Sessions
item.description: Hi Everyone! Here is this week's new mix. Merry Christmas! Here is the Playlist: 1) "Give It 2 U" - Seamus Haji (Frankie Knuckles Gagatha Christie Mix) 2) "More Thank Enough" - Danny Clark & Jay Benham (Sean McCabe Classic Mix) 3) "Brighter Days" - Big Moses feat. Kenny Bobien (Mousse T Fiece Vocal mix) 4) "Love In The Club" - Soulmagic feat. Louis Hale & J (Classic Mix) 5) "Love Is The Key" - Montana & Stewart feat. Kafele (Richard Earnshaw Main Mix) 6) "So Sweetly" - M&S feat. Shaun Excoffery (Kenny Carpenter Big Apple Mix) 7) "Change My World" - Scott Diaz (Original Mix) 8) "Make You Mix" - Devoted Few feat. Alexandria O (Original Mix) 9) "Release Your Soul" - Tumelo (Vick Lavender's Special Extended Vocal Mix) 10) "Close Your Eyes" - Miguel Migs feat. Meshell Ndeg (Osunlade's Yoruba Soul Mix) Make Love, Not War! Peace, Theo :)

item.title: 12_16_2011 DJ Theo's Soulful San Francisco House Sessions
item.description: Hi Everyone! This week I'm bringing you another All-Star mix featuring my favorite Top 10 tracks in the past few months. Here is the Playlist: 1) "Run Free" - Kings on King Street (Sean McCabe Vocal Remix) 2) "Trippin On Love" - Aaron Ross feat. Rain People (Original Mix) 3) "Alibi" - Reel People feat. Darien (Dennis F's Out On Bail Mix) 4) "I Need To Love Me" - Kings of Tomorrow feat. April (Sandy Rivera's Club Mix) 5) "Angel" - Liquideep (DJ Spen & Gary Hudge Long Version Mix) 6) "Walk Away" - ATFC feat. Lisa Shaw (ATFC's VB Weekender Vocal Mix) 7) "Stealing Love" - Grant Nelson (Original Mix) 8) "Step 2 Me" - Swing City (Shane D Remix) 9) "Spread Love" - Cookie Monsterz & Michelle Weeks (Reelsoul Vocal) 10) "Found Love" - Blaze (Fanatix Vocal Mix) Make Love, Not War! Peace, Theo

item.title: 12_09_2011 DJ Theo's Soulful San Francisco House Sessions
item.description: Hi Everyone! Here is this week's new podcast! We welcome back DJ Omar Johnson ( http://jamescouzens.podomatic.com/ ) from the San Francisco Bay Area finishing the last 40 minutes for us! Big Thank You to All the Listeners Around the World! Here is my playlist: DJ Theo (San Francisco, CA) 1) "Burning Hot" - Peven Everett (Timmy Regisford Remix) 2) "Never Felt So Fly" - Rasmus Faber feat. Melo (So Fly Remix) 3) "Can't Wait" - Hennings Project feat. Daryl S (UPZ Phunky Mix) 4) "Alive" - Aaron Ross & Sterling Ensemble (Straight Up Mix) 5) "Affection" - Pat Bedeau & Steve Gurley (Guy Robin Remix) 6) "Joy Til Midnight" - DJ Said feat. Reelsoul (Rasoul Remix) 7) "Back to House" - Dimitri from Paris & DJ Rocca (EP Mix) Much Love, Theo :)

item.title: 12_02_2011 DJ Theo's Soulful San Francisco House Sessions
item.description: Hi Everyone! I can't Believe it's Already December 2011! Time Flies! Here is this week's 2 hour mix with Funky Blackman finishing the last hour for us. Here is the Much Desired Playlist! Thank You Guys for your Patience! DJ Theo (San Francisco, CA) 1) "I Wanna Be Yours" - MenaKeys & Marlon D feat. Emory (Original Mix) 2) "Wake Up" - B.A.M. & Reelsoul (Original Mix) 3) "Come Together" - Andy Ward & Random Soul (Andy Ward Vocal Mix) 4) "Don't Worry About Your Problems" - The MuthaFunkaz (Original Mix) 5) "Mysterious" - Knee Deep (Bobby D'Ambrosio Vocal Club Remix) 6) "Live 4 Now" - t3N (83 West Main Mix) 7) "Scavengerz Hunt" - David Harness & Chris Lum (Soul Bump Original) 8) "Best Kept Secret" - TL Cross (Abicah Soul Remix) 9) "Please Don't Save Me" - Maurice Joshua (Main Mix) 10) "In My Lifetime" - Reel People (Danny Krivit Edit) Enjoy! Much Love! Theo :)
item.dc:creator: DJ Theo

Enjoy! Much Love! Theo :)

item.title: 11_25_2011 DJ Theo's Soulful San Francisco House Sessions
item.description: Hi Everyone! Happy Thanksgiving! Last week I was in South Beach Miami & The Bahamas on Vacation so I didn't have a chance to do a mix. This week we welcome a good friend DJ Omar who will be finishing the last hour for us from the San Francisco Bay Area. Here is the Playlist for my first hour mix: 1) "Find Me Some Love" - Reegroove feat. LT Brown (Original Mix) 2) "Deputy Of Love" - Hope's Matters (Groove Assassin Disco Slam Remix) 3) "Moments" - David Harness & Chris Lum (Original Mix) 4) "Race Of Survival" - Seamus Haji feat. Mekkah (Sean McCabe Remix) 5) "I'm So Grateful" - Benedetto & Farina *Greg Gauthier Dance Culture Mix) 6) "I Do Love You" - The MuthaFunkaz (Main 12" Mix) 7) "Don't Rush" - Wipe The Needle feat. Lifford (Main Mix) 8) "Care Free" - Barbara Tucker (Sean McCabe Remix) 9) "Tsholohelo" - Jason Cheiron feat. Wada (Main Mix) 10) "A Mighty Wind" - David Harness & Chris Lum (Original Mix) Make Love, Not War! Peace, Theo :)

item.title: 06_10_2011 DJ Theo's Soulful San Francisco House Sessions
item.description: Hi Everyone! Here is this week's podcast! Much Love to all the Listeners around the World! Big Thank You to Podomatic & ITUNES! This week we welcome back DJ Ern from Chicago. For more information go to djernie.podomatic.com. Playlist Coming Soon! Love Theo!

item.title: 06_03_2011 DJ Theo's Soulful San Francisco House Sessions
item.description: Hi Everyone! Here is this week's new episode. We Welcome Back DJ Zuska from New York who finishes the last 30 minutes for us! Thank you to all the listeners and supporters! Big Up to ITUNES & Podomatic! Here is the Playlist: DJ Theo (San Francisco, CA) (0-30 Minutes) 1) "Take Your Time" - Random Soul feat. Kristen Pears (Random Soul Classic Mix) 2) "Smile" - Bobby & Steve feat. Wyen Solo (Bobby & Steve & Michael Hughes Main Vocal Mix) 3) "Think Twice" - JD73 (Sean McCabe Mix) 4) "Reach" - Alex Millet feat. SuSu Bobien (Reelsoul Vocal Mix) 5) "Crying For Love" - Manoo & Francois A feat. Dyann (Vocal Mix) DJ Zuska (Long Island, NY) (30-60 Minutes) www.djzuska.podomatic.com 1) "Clap Your Hands" - Zakes Bantwini feat. Xolani Sithole (Club Mix) 2) "One Love 2011" - Groove Cocktail feat. Nathalia (Johnny Montana & Craigs Stewart Remix) 3) "Nobody" - Copyright feat. Imaani (Franky Rizardo Remix) 4) "Take Me Back" - Kings of Tomorrow feat. April (Simon Mattson's Deep Mix) 5) "It's Over" - ATFC feat. Rae (Wally Lopez & Edgar Vm Factomania Remix) 6) "God Made Me Phunky" - MD X-Spress (Gennaro Masrantonio & Billy Johnston Remix) Make Love Not War! Research "Chemtrails" and "New World Order" to start understanding what is going on around us...Peace, Theo...:)

item.title: 05_27_2011 DJ Theo's Soulful San Francisco House Sessions
item.description: Hi Everyone! Here is this week's new mix. We Welcome DJ Elixir from Los Angeles California, Not London as originally said, sorry who will be finishing the last 30 minutes for us! Much Love to all the listeners! Big Up to Podomatic and ITUNES! Here is the Playlist: DJ Theo (San Francisco, CA) (0-30 Minutes) 1) "Bittersweet Love Affair" - Jay Sinister & Louie Vega (Dance Ritual Mix) 2) "Dreamscape E.P." - Sweetreat (Original Defected 2002 Mix) 3) "Let Go" - Yass feat. Arnold Jarvis (Main Mix) 4) "Starting Over" - Soul Heaven feat. Gary Bardouille (Aaron's Stripped Down Church Edit) 5) "Need You Now" - D-Fused & Digital 06_01 Soul Central (Sergio Flores Remix) DJ Elixir (Los Angeles, CA) (30-60 Minutes) www.djelixir.podomatic.com 1) "Hummingbird" - Maya Jane Coles (Original Club Mix) 2) "Tropicasa" - Aztec Sol (Original Mix) 3) "Claves De Ti" - Carlos Sanchez & DJ Ray (Original Mix) 4) "Chiuso" - Nouveau Yorican (Original Mix) 5) "Refugees of Love" - Fabio Bacchini feat. Rainy Payne (Original Mix) 6) "What's The Time" - The Littlemen (Original Mix) Much Love to all the Listeners & Supporters Around the World! Also Research the "New World Order" and "Chemtrails" so you can start understanding what is going on around us right now. Nice Weather around the world, right??? :) Peace, Theo...

item.title: 05_20_2011 DJ Theo's Soulful San Francisco House Sessions
item.description: Hi Everyone! Here is this week's new Episode. I have a special treat with DJ Anthony Molina from Getaway Recordings finishing the last 15 minutes of the set with a nice downtempo mix. It's something you can chill to and have a drink, relax, unwind all that stress of the crazy work week! BIG Thank You to all the listeners and supporters around the world! Big Shout to Podomatic & ITUNES! Here is the Playlist: DJ Theo (San Francisco, CA) (0-45 Minutes) 1) "Love It" - BSTC feat. JL (Phil Asher's Restless Soul Vocal Mix) 2) "Get Close" - DJN Project feat. Arnold Jarvis (Original Vox) 3) "Then Came You" - Harley & Muscle feat. India (Jamie Lewis Where We Came From Mix) 4) "Spend My Life" - Reelsoul (Original Mix) 5) "Remember Me" - Deep City Soul feat. Rainy Payne (Mr. V De Ja Vu Main Mix) 6) "I Wanna Go" - Stereo Mutants feat. Jannae Jo (Mr. Moon Re-touch Remix) 7) "Reflex" - Johnny Fiasco (JT Donaldson Remix) DJ Anthony Molina (Phoenix, AZ) (45-60 Minutes) www.soundcloud.com/anthonymolina 1. James Bledsoe - High Hopes 2. Anthony Molina - Thinking Machine 3. Anthony Molina - Eco Society 4. Anthony Molina - To Have You Much Love to All the People who support this show and music! Peace, Theo...:)
item.dc:creator: DJ Theo
item.itunes:summary:
Hi Everyone! Here is this week's new Episode. I have a special treat with DJ Anthony Molina from Getaway Recordings finishing the last 15 minutes of the set with a nice downtempo mix. It's something you can chill to and have a drink, relax, unwind all that stress of the crazy work week! BIG Thank You to all the listeners and supporters around the world! Big Shout to Podomatic & ITUNES! Here is the Playlist:
DJ Theo (San Francisco, CA) (0-45 Minutes)
1) "Love It" - BSTC feat. JL (Phil Asher's Restless Soul Vocal Mix) 2) "Get Close" - DJN Project feat. Arnold Jarvis (Original Vox) 3) "Then Came You" - Harley & Muscle feat. India (Jamie Lewis Where We Came From Mix) 4) "Spend My Life" - Reelsoul (Original Mix) 5) "Remember Me" - Deep City Soul feat. Rainy Payne (Mr. V De Ja Vu Main Mix) 6) "I Wanna Go" - Stereo Mutants feat. Jannae Jo (Mr. Moon Re-touch Remix) 7) "Reflex" - Johnny Fiasco (JT Donaldson Remix)

Much Love to All the People who support this show and music! Peace, Theo...:)

item.title: 05_13_2011 DJ Theo's Soulful San Francisco House Sessions
item.description: Hi Everyone! Here is this week's new episode! We welcome DJ Anna back from Australia. Thank you Very Much to Anna for submitting her smooth mix and nice picture...;) Thank you to All the Listeners and Supporters around the World! Research "Chemtrails" and "New World Order" to start understanding what is going on around us. Keep an open mind... Here is the Playlist: DJ Theo (San Francisco, CA) (0-30 Minutes) 1) "Sweetness Is" - Peven Everett (Koyla Remix) 2) "You Turn Me Around" - Nature Love (Jonny Montanna & Craig Stewart Mix) 3) "You.Me.World" - Monique Bringham (Leighton Moody Soul Side Up Mix) 4) "Reach Inside" - Bah Samba (Sean McCabe Vocal Mix) 5) "Elle" - DJ Gregory (Defected Ibize Copyright Re-edit) DJ Anna Sonnenburg (Brisbane, Australia) (30-60 Minutes) http://soundcloud.com/annasonnenburg 1. Maw - "To Be In Love" ( frankie feliciano remix) 2. Frankie Knuckles - "I'll take you there" 3. Ron Carroll - "Free" 4. Clemens Rumpf and David A. Tobin - "Fire" (abicah soul remix) 5. Ultra Nate and Dj Spen - "Give it 2 U" 6. Grant Nelson - "John's House" Much Love! Peace, Theo...:)

item.title: 04_29_2011 DJ Theo's Soulful San Francisco House Sessions
item.description: Hi Everyone! Here is this week's new episode! I chose my top 10 tracks from the past few months and did an "All-Star" Mix for 1 hour with no guest DJs this week. Big Thank You to All the Listeners! If you would like to have your own 30 minute house mix showcased on this podcast email me your idea at "djtheosf@hotmail.com." Here is the Playlist: DJ Theo (San Francisco, CA) (0-60 Minutes) 1) "Lose My Worries" - Ralf Gum feat. Inaya Day (Louis Benedetti Vocal Mix) 2) "Happy" - Louis Benedetti feat. Kenny Bobien (Louis Benedetti Extended Vocal Mix) 3) "Song For Sharma" - Soul Central (Grant Nelson Remix) 4) "Special Kind of Love" - Jazz-n-Groove feat. Arnold Jarvis (Primetime Club Mix) 5) "Shake It Up" - Phil Asher & The Mighty Zaf (Main Mix) 6) "Desire" - Richard Earnshaw feat. Michael Canitrot (Classic Vocal Mix) 7) "Getting Nowhere" - Magnetic Man feat. John Legend (Yoruba Soul Remix) 8) "The 1,2" - AG Thomas (ReelSoul Vocal Mix) 9) "Make Me Beautiful" - Sofia Rubina (ReelSoul Remix) 10) "Peter Gunn" - Bobby D'Ambrosio feat. Jamelle (Osio Funky Club Mix) Make Love, Not War! Research "Chemtrails" & "New World Order." Much Love, Peace! Theo

item.title: 04_22_2011 DJ Theo's Soulful San Francisco House Sessions
item.description: Hi Everyone! This week's show has a very special guest DJ David Harness representing the San Francisco Bay Area. He is one of my favorite all time DJ's and definitely an inspiration for many people! Much Love to all the Listeners and Downloaders. I mix the first 30 minutes and Mr. Harness finishes the final 30 minutes. Playlist coming soon! Make Love, Not War! Peace, Theo...:)

item.title: 04_15_2011 DJ Theo's Birthday All-Star Soulful San Francisco House Sessions
item.description: Hi Everyone! Here is this week's new episode. I chose 13 of my favorite tracks from the past 6 months of shows. I'm sure you have heard most of these tracks already, but it's always fun to hear them in a new order and mixing differently. I want to Thank All the Listeners & Downloaders from around the world. Thank You to Podomatic & ITUNES for their support! Playlist coming soon! Make Love, Not War! Peace, Theo

item.title: 12_31_2010 DJ Theo's Soulful San Francisco New Years House Mix
item.description: Hi Everyone! Happy New Year! Hopefully 2011 is very positive for us! Here is a special 2 hour house mix. I am mixing the first hour, then we have a special guest DJ from Chicago DJ Ernie! You can check him out at djernie.podomatic.com for more information and future mixes. Thank You to All the listeners and supporters of this show! Big Up to Podomatic & ITUNES! Here is the Playlist: DJ Theo (San Francisco, CA) 1) "Respect Yourself" - Randy Crawford & Joe Sample (Reel People Remix) 2) "Reach Inside" - Bah Samba (Sean McCabe Vocal Remix) 3) "Starting Over" - Soul Heaven feat. Gary Bardouille (Aaron's Stripped Down Church Remix) 4) "More Love" - Maurice Joshua feat. Andrea Lo (Maurice Joshua Main Mix) 5) "One Step" - The Realm feat. Darien (Realm Vocal Mix) 6) "For The Love of You" - D'Moov feat. Nicole Henry (Frankie Feliciano Vocal Mix) 7) "Love It" - BSTC feat. JL (Phil Asher's Restless Soul Vocal Mix) 8) "Need You Now" - D-fused & Digital 06-01 Soul Central (Sergio Flores Remix) 9) "Butterflies" - Reel People feat. Dyanna Fearon (Restless Soul Heaven Remix) 10) "Innamorata" - Mr. V feat. Athene Noelle (Mr. V's Main Vocal Mix) DJ Ernie (Chicago, IL) 1. Sa Trincha - Lissat 2. Two Dots - Lusine 3. Sunday Showers - Kentphonik 4. Kissing Strange - Monique Bingham & Ralf Gum 5. Yesterday - Jose Nunez 6. Trumpet Step - Chris Rockford 7. You Got Me Burning Up! 2008 Mixes - Cevin Fisher 8. Say Say Say - Hi Track 9. Hciendo Musica - Mark Reeve 10. How Do I Let Go - Dennis Ferrer 11. Poor People - Quentin Harris Love You Guys! Stay Tuned Each & Every Friday for a new show! That's Right, 1 a week for you guys! Theo...:)

item.title: Theo's February Father Dedication House Mix 2010
item.description: Hi Everyone, This Mix is Dedicated to my Father who is very sick in the hospital right now. I Hope he has enough energy to speak to me when I go visit him this weekend. Hi Everyone! Update, My Father is still alive and kicking, but I think his time has come. I hear all physical bodies contain an "eternal soul?" Not sure, but I'm assuming there is a lot energy around us that we cannot explain, almost like a parallel dimension. Anyways, hopefully he is going to a better place, more peaceful, not full of War, where you can speak your mind and not be an outcast, and where "Good Overcomes Evil." But that might be all dreams? Who Knows, I still have hope for us common people of the world! Don't let the Evil "Elite" people kill you like sheep or cattle, use your minds and creativity to overcome the Propaganda. Enough Preaching, Here is the Playlist: 1) "Nobody" - M.O.C.A. feat. Michelle Weeks (Vintage Soulful Radio Remix) 2) "Oracle" - Afro Medusa (Grant Nelson's Latin Soul Mix) 3) "Turn Me On" - Black Coffee feat. Bucie (Original Mix) 4) "Something Right" - Chuck Love (Soul Symphony Remix) 5) "So Grateful" - Dennis Ferrer feat. Kenny Bobien (Fanatix Remix) 6) "Wonderful" - Terry Hunter feat. Terisa Griffin (Terry's Main Club Mix) 7) "Pull Up To The Bumper" - Funkstar De Luxe feat. Grace Jones (Radio De Luxe Mix) 8) "The Deejays An Alien" - David Harness feat. Roland Clark (Original Thread Mix) 9) "You Groove Me" - Jon Cutler feat. Kemdi (Osunlade Remix) 10) "Freedom To Feel Love" - Erick Morillo (Theo's Soulful House Remix) 11) "Party Train" - The GAP Band (Original 12" Special Dance Mix) Make Love, Not War! Don't Believe all the Hype & Propaganda! Peace, Theo...:)
